title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western 

Waters Landing Obligation) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall cease to have effect on 31 December 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited sea-fisheries (north western water landing obligation) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall cease effect 31 december 2023

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“Council Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No 1380/2013 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 December 2013 (as 
amended by Regulation (EU) 2015/812 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 20 May 2015, Regulation (EU) 2017/2092 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 15 November 2017 and 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1241 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 2019); 

“Commission Regulation” means Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2020/2015 of 21 August 2020. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in the Council Regulation or the 
Commission Regulation and is also used in these Regulations, has, unless the 
context otherwise requires, the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in 
the Council Regulation or the Commission Regulation. 

1 OJ L 354, 28.12.2013, p. 22 
2 OJ L 133, 29.5.2015, p.1 
3 OJ L 302, 17.11.2017, p. 1 
4 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
5 OJ L 415, 10.12.2020, p. 22 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [101] 3

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 4. The master of -
text_raw:
4. The master of - 

(a) 

(b) 

an Irish sea-fishing boat wherever it may be, or 

a sea-fishing boat in the exclusive fishing limits of the State 

shall comply with the requirements imposed by Articles 8 and 15 of the 
Commission Regulation in respect of fishing vessels and masters of such 
vessels.

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 5. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation)
text_raw:
5. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation) 

Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 54 of 2020) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 March, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [101]

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument implements the Landing Obligation contained in Article 15 of 
the Common Fisheries Policy Regulation 1380/2013 in respect of certain 
demersal fisheries in North Western Waters and gives effect to Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/2015 of 21 August 2020. These regulations 
cease to have effect on 31 December 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [101] 5
